argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | tuslem.k | |- K = ( toUnifSp ` U ) |
| 2 |  | #P_id | |- ( U e. ( UnifOn ` X ) -> U e. ( UnifOn ` X ) ) |
| 3 | 1 | #P_tususs | |- ( U e. ( UnifOn ` X ) -> U = ( UnifSt ` K ) ) |
| 4 | 1 | #P_tusbas | |- ( U e. ( UnifOn ` X ) -> X = ( Base ` K ) ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( U e. ( UnifOn ` X ) -> ( UnifOn ` X ) = ( UnifOn ` ( Base ` K ) ) ) |
| 6 | 2, 3, 5 | #P_3eltr3d | |- ( U e. ( UnifOn ` X ) -> ( UnifSt ` K ) e. ( UnifOn ` ( Base ` K ) ) ) |
| 7 | 1 | #P_tusunif | |- ( U e. ( UnifOn ` X ) -> U = ( UnifSet ` K ) ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( U e. ( UnifOn ` X ) -> ( unifTop ` U ) = ( unifTop ` ( UnifSet ` K ) ) ) |
| 9 | 1 | #P_tuslem | |- ( U e. ( UnifOn ` X ) -> ( X = ( Base ` K ) /\ U = ( UnifSet ` K ) /\ ( unifTop ` U ) = ( TopOpen ` K ) ) ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_simp3d | |- ( U e. ( UnifOn ` X ) -> ( unifTop ` U ) = ( TopOpen ` K ) ) |
| 11 | 7, 3 | #P_eqtr3d | |- ( U e. ( UnifOn ` X ) -> ( UnifSet ` K ) = ( UnifSt ` K ) ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( U e. ( UnifOn ` X ) -> ( unifTop ` ( UnifSet ` K ) ) = ( unifTop ` ( UnifSt ` K ) ) ) |
| 13 | 8, 10, 12 | #P_3eqtr3d | |- ( U e. ( UnifOn ` X ) -> ( TopOpen ` K ) = ( unifTop ` ( UnifSt ` K ) ) ) |
| 14 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` K ) = ( Base ` K ) |
| 15 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( UnifSt ` K ) = ( UnifSt ` K ) |
| 16 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( TopOpen ` K ) = ( TopOpen ` K ) |
| 17 | 14, 15, 16 | #P_isusp | |- ( K e. UnifSp <-> ( ( UnifSt ` K ) e. ( UnifOn ` ( Base ` K ) ) /\ ( TopOpen ` K ) = ( unifTop ` ( UnifSt ` K ) ) ) ) |
| 18 | 6, 13, 17 | #P_sylanbrc | |- ( U e. ( UnifOn ` X ) -> K e. UnifSp ) |
